kyber: Set Up Learning Cohorts on GitHub

Source: R/kyber-package.R
kyber-package.Rd

Provides tools for setting up Openscapes learning cohorts, including creating agendas, creating and modifying GitHub org/team memberships, setting up cohort GitHub repositories, and creating completion certificates.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://openscapes.github.io/kyber/

  • https://github.com/Openscapes/kyber

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/Openscapes/kyber/issues
